name: Lost Caves
description:
Spelunk, plunder, and pickaxe in this 2D collect-a-thon, taking you down to the depths of a cavern housing the remnants of a lost civilization! You're trapped down here, and it seems like the only way out is to get rich.....
Lost Caves takes you through 4 expansive, labyrinth-like levels, filled with over 80 unique treasures in nearly every corner. The more treasure you collect, the more rich you become, and the more rich you become, the further you can explore into these caves! Be careful though, because down here, you aren't alone, and you most certainly aren't welcome...
